problem: ^Thank the gods you're here! I need help!

stitch2: ^You see, while I was transporting my goods, the wheel of my precious cart broke!
^Now, I can easily get a new one from the repairman down the road.
^However, the repairman requires an important piece of information before he is able to begin creating a new wheel.
stitch4: ^Well, he needs to know the standard equation of the wheel, given that the arc of the wheel passes through A(-7,0), B(1, 4) and C(7, 2).
